topic.title: Slave
topic.body: the owners of the world will not rest until they enslave humanity

1624920099_1LgRcoq7CT8hsQKotzjx2CPWZiio2.body:
> [epistemic](#comment_8_1GLrPVFs91nhs2HYnxZj8BXL8pYSdKNu4L): Name names of people who enslave others and how they do it.This cannot include any situations in which there are choices.Go.
we are slaves of the system, try to live outside of it and you will be an outcast

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1047_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): controlling people was always of interest of some, though i do not think there is a time for some human government to "enslave" the world for longer period of time since we may be living at the end of the period when people was governing themself https://www.jw.org/en/bible-teachings/questions/end-times-prophecy-sign/
all governments in the world are authoritarian, people think they have liberties covid came to show us our limitation of freedom
